LanguageData.JRWSpinosaurus.label: Spinosaurus
LanguageData.JRWSpinosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #07642-1915 [SPINOSAURUS AEGYPTIACUS] CODENAME: SOBEK >482
An extremely large theropod with a sail running along its back. Viscious and incredibly deadly, this creature was bred illegally and wreaked havoc during the 2001 incident on Isla Sorna.
